title: You can see the page shown in Figure 11-2
Click Downloads for Office 2003, located under BROWSE DOWNLOADS in the middle of the page. The Downloads for Office 2003 page will be opened
Click the Add-Ins link under InfoPath 2003. The Add-Ins for InfoPath 2003 page will be displayed, listing the InfoPath 2003 Toolkit for Visual Studio .NET
Click the InfoPath 2003 Toolkit for Visual Studio .NET link. The download page will then be displayed
If you are in Internet Explorer, a security warning is given

note: You will see the message displayed in Figure 11-3.
title: Click Run to download and install the toolkit
